name: sydney riendeau
text: I ordered BBQ pizza with bacon with some cinnamon rolls. The pizza had zero sauce, it basically strangled me, It was completely dry and the cinnomon rolls were the same. I called and the manager was very rude saying that she made it â€¦More

name: Amy Balius
text: Hands down fast and excellent service yesterday. My order was hot and fresh. Highly recommended. One of the last dine in Pizza Huts, let's give them our business to keep them around.

name: Sherryc
text: Amanda and Ember are very friendly and Awesome staff. Pizza was very good.

name: Virginia M
text: Staff did not seems like they knew what they were doing. The manager was called in off her vacation to get things back in order. One employee kept telling me to go sit in my car and then bring my order out. I went in every 20 minutes â€¦More

name: David Blanton
text: Felt like eating out at Pizza Hut during the 1980's in a GOOD way. Pizza and wings tasted the way they look in commercials. HOT, FRESH, and perfect light buttery crust. Forget delivery and GO to the source. I'll be seeing you guys again soon.

name: Lucas Phillips
text: Pizza Hut is a favorite, some locations less desirable than others. Last 2 experiences here could've been better. Food over cooked/dried out, staff couldn't manage to care if customer was happy, or even there at all. No one was rude, just apathetic.

name: Jonathon Harp
text: Ordered a few pizzas and a calzone, cashier was nice and polite, gave me a to-go cup to fill up as many times as I needed while I waited. The wait was a little longer than expected but my order came out super hot and fresh.

name: Jennifer Barnes
text: Fantastic food and great staff

name: Kim Brou
text: Now I love Pizza Hut's pizza. Everything is wonderful there I love their lunch buffet I love their food the only thing that I would say is they need to put more toppings on their Pizza especially when you order for them to come to your home â€¦More

name: Felicia Spikes
text: I'm giving the manager Jason five stars his customer satisfaction was super! No questions asked he explained and made the wrongs right! Pizza that was delivered was delicious ðŸ˜‹

name: C Y
text: It was nice to be in a classic Pizza Hut. Yes, it is an older building, and it is a bit worn. However, the employees were all smiling and cheerful. Most importantly, the salad bar was fresh, the pizza bar was varied, and it all tasted great!

name: Navid Razmi
text: I called and was hung up on two times.  It went to the call center and they told me they deliver to my address, but the Ocean Spring location is closed.  Needless to say it is a Saturday at 6:50p.m. one of the busiest days of the week for a â€¦More

name: Lisa Lemley
text: Great pizza and a super sweet new employee who was very helpful! Amanda was her name! They have a salad bar too! Highly recommend!

name: John Powell
text: Saint Martin pizza hut extremely good food.management staff very good at their jobs and professionalism I highly recommend that everyone try it

name: Robert Husley Jr
text: Pizza was good but the buffet was not kept full.

name: Rodger Hormell
text: The assistant manager was very hospitable.  Pizzas and wings we're hot and fresh.  Loved the sit in area.  Clean and cozy.  We will be back.

name: Michelle Lott
text: Melissa has been there forever, she is the BEST! PH in Ocean Springs is our "go to" for lunch for years! Great price, good food, and staff is always smiling! Love it...

name: Robert Rhodes
text: This is a very old location. Our waitress was excellent.  But the buffet was lacking.

text: nice place to eat

name: Joshua Butcher
text: Was fast and efficient. Great service.

name: Meghan Finley
text: One of the few pizza huts I know where you can still sit and dine

name: Randy Ball
text: Always fresh. Always nice people. Never too busy  great prices,. The ingredients are always fresh.  The deals are worth going back for.  Best Pizza there is.  No other company comes close. Delivery is always fast. Restaurant is always clean.

text: Nothing came out right! Ordered 3 orders of wings, 3 orders of cheese sticks, 1 order of mozz sticks, and 1 pizza. â€¦More

text: My name is Melissa & I work lunch buffet @ OS Pizza Hut M-F 11-130!! Come see me for a yummy, fast, great service with a SMILE & affordable lunch for only $5.99!!! (AYCD sodas are $1.99)

name: jonathan burnett
text: The young man taking the order on the phone was very rude and kept cutting me off then said "its gonna be over a hour do you still want it" !!! Not very good business .I feel sorry for the delivery person's tips after having to talk with â€¦More

text: Classic Pizza Hut pizza, great location to have a pizza party!

name: Mike Horner
text: Lunch buffet and staff is great. Tuesday night with family was the total waste.  Pizza was a no show . I guess cigarettes out back was the only thing cooking.

name: Victoria Jacobs
text: The females ran the place so smoothly and efficiently I had to ask did the own it! I was told no, but the owner needs to reward them with $$$. I mean they treated EVERYBODY who came in as if they were millionaires. You can not pay enough for that kind of service these days!!!

name: Krustyking Crabbymariner
text: Decent buffet on Tuesday night.

name: Stephanie Short
text: Oh my goodness! Never again! People, do not eat here! The window sills had dead bugs and dirt in them, don't think the windows have been cleaned in a long time. The food was not great either. Wilted lettuce on the salad bar, no pepper in â€¦More

name: Michael Brolaski
text: Food wise, it is your typical pizza chain pizza, but what sells it is the service you receive. I tend to go during the week for the lunch buffet, which for $7 drink and tax included it's kinda hard to beat. The lady that works during the â€¦More
